attributes.action: Do NOT bring in censorship laws regarding vaccines
attributes.additional_details: The emergency laws that are due to come in, regarding anti-vaccine posts are an infringement of our rights and freedom. WE DO NOT CONSENT to this censorship. The public have a right to uncensored information in order to make informed choices regarding vaccines. WE DO NOT CONSENT TO TOTALITARIANISM.
attributes.background: Do not allow this law to come into effect,  we the public do not consent to censorship. And we certainly do not consent to censorship when it comes to making informed choices regarding vaccines and our health

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government is working with social media companies to limit the spread of vaccine misinformation and disinformation. However, there are currently no plans to introduce new legislation to limit online discussion or information specifically relating to the Covid-19 vaccine.

See: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/social-media-giants-agree-package-of-measures-with-uk-government-to-tackle-vaccine-disinformation
